question: Swadhinta Puraskar is the highest civilian award of which country?
explanation:
The Government of Bangladesh has announced the names of 9 individuals and one organization who are being conferred with the Swadhinta Puraskar 2021, the nationâ€™s highest civilian award.
Out of 9 individuals, 4 are awarded posthumously. Bangladesh Agriculture Research Council has been nominated for research and training under the organisation category.
